allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add multiple enhancements to Pipedream components

- Script Generator: Add duplicate prevention with GCS history tracking
- Script Generator: Add unique content requirements (avoid generic info)
- Script Generator: Add minimum character length enforcement
- Scene Image Generator: Add image style selection (7 styles)
- YouTube Upload: Enhance title with 3-5 trending hashtags
- Creatomate Render: Add duration validation and debugging
- Creatomate Render: Fix font_size format (% -> vw)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git rebase -i 756bafb --exec 'sed -i """" ""s/sk-proj-[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*/your_openai_api_key_here/g; s/sk-itkeIgX2rRQAVQ4sTvjm4DgS9yslFATfiaVFqxMK4YZrcRnq/your_stability_api_key_here/g; s/968a045e9d971eb754eee1c9240997c0aadc64353399943d6201eb543bbea203/your_elevenlabs_api_key_here/g; s/key_04ee02b422f6b04f911420be27bf67a8b20005e57583f581dcf172e76e7e94e19e79709554f325df960d583f707dce8282c63e2b116041c5138056fb1199c8c5/your_runway_api_key_here/g; s/5bad4e3eb03b4fb391fc5b0085bb8a05d7abab1be8b8c1b88bde1c29a175f4f5f230cbede093b2cdd3575740655cc262/your_creatomate_api_key_here/g"" .env.example 2>/dev/null; git add .env.example 2>/dev/null; git commit --amend --no-edit 2>/dev/null || true')

Bash(git rebase -i 756bafb~1 --exec 'if [ -f .env.example ]; then cat > .env.example << ""ENVEOF""
# Stability AI API Key
# Get your API key from: https://platform.stability.ai/account/keys
STABILITY_API_KEY=your_stability_api_key_here

# OpenAI API Key (for GPT-4o style analysis & Whisper)
# Get your API key from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key_here

# ElevenLabs API Key (for TTS)
# Get your API key from: https://elevenlabs.io/
ELEVENLABS_API_KEY=your_elevenlabs_api_key_here

# Runway API Key (for image-to-video)
# Get your API key from: https://runway.ml/
RUNWAY_API_KEY=your_runway_api_key_here

# Creatomate API Key (for video composition)
# Get your API key from: https://creatomate.com/
CREATOMATE_API_KEY=your_creatomate_api_key_here

# Google Cloud Storage
# Path to service account JSON file
GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS_PATH=./google-credentials.json
GCS_BUCKET_NAME=your_bucket_name_here
ENVEOF
git add .env.example && git commit --amend --no-edit; fi')
